Class AstraDBRepository<DOC>

java.lang.Object
com.dtsx.astra.sdk.AstraDBRepository<DOC>
Type Parameters:
DOC - working document
public class AstraDBRepository<DOC> extends Object
Client for AstraDB collection using repository pattern.
